Intro.Body: You have just finished moving your final box from your dad's car into your new room.  It's your first day of college and you're filled with excitement.  Just as your parent's are about to leave

Choices.Text: You give them a hug and tell them you'll miss them
You thank them and tell them you'll call them later

Start_1.Body: "We'll miss you to, enjoy yourself and don't be afraid to call!", they say. Once they close the door, the question of "what do I do now?" comes to your head.

Choices.Text: You decide to go explore the campus and perhaphs find your classes

Start_2.Body: "Have fun! We'll catch up later", they say as they leave. Once they close the door, the question of "what do I do now?" comes to your head.

Choices.Text: You decide to go explore the campus and perhaphs find your classes

Explore Campus.Body: You decide to go out and explore  campus, where to first?

Science Building.Body: You arrive at the Science Building, full of labs and and coats. You take a look around

Choices.Text: Head Over to the Dining Hall
Head Over to the Engineering Building
Head Over to the big field

Classroom 1.Body: Nothing much here, just a couple of beakers and tubes

Classroom 2 (location specific interacti.Body: There's a red liquid inside a flask and some powder laying around

Purple.Body: A purple cloud of smoke explodes out of the flask!

Brown.Body: A brown cloud of smoke explodes out of the flask!

Magenta.Body: A magenta cloud of smoke explodes out of the flask!

Pink.Body: A pink cloud of smoke explodes out of the flask!

Engineering Building Locked.Body: You arrive at the Engineering Building, nothing of much interest except a room tucked away in the corner which is locked.

Choices.Text: Head Over to the Dining Hall
Head Over to the Science Building
Head Over to the big field

Big Field.Body: What a sight!  This is the biggest open field you've seen at any college, it is part of the reason you chose to go here.  Where do you go from here?

Choices.Text: Head Over to the Dining Hall
Head Over to the Engineering Building
Head Over to the Science Building

Bench.Body: You sit down and relax, you've done a lot of walking today and these hills are not kind to your calves.  After your rest, you go back to the field

Bush.Body: There's a key here! It read "Computer Lab", you figure out that it might just be the key to that room in the engineering building.

Choices.Text: Head Over to the Engineering Building

Engineering Building Unlocked.Body: You insert the key and--to your amazement--it actually does open the door! You walk into this computer lab full of retro tech.  You play around with some of it (and end up taking some with you too).  What a great first day!
